songs.title: Intro (International Ballers)
songs.lyrics:
[50 Cent]
My mom always told me: "whatever you do, you be the best at it" and I just figured out what I wanna be, I wanna be a bad guy (laughs)
I wanna be the best fucking bad guy you've seen so far, I just want you to know I like it when you say I'm a bad guy (laughs)
